hero.text-description: Programmer in training, with approximately 7 months of experience. I am immersed in a continuous learning process, exploring different projects that can add to my knowledge.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.text-aboutme1: My name is Arthur da Silva Monteiro, I'm 19 years old, I have 2 dogs and I've been part of the technological universe since a very early age. However, my programming journey began at FAETERJ college in 2022, where, in three months, I absorbed the fundamentals of programming logic. It was there that a friend recommended SERRATEC to me, where I participated in an intensive bootcamp, dedicating five intense months that represented around 90% of my knowledge in the area.
aboutme.text-aboutme2: Currently, I'm focused on practicing and expanding my knowledge, seeking to carry out several projects from scratch and in different languages, both in the back-end and front-end. And with my dedication to the area, I seek continuous growth in this field.
